title: How to supervise
creator_credit: David Pitt, Francis Gysin and National Coal Board
brief_description: Defines the responsibilities of the supervisor and reinforces the need for a civilised relationship between supervisor and trainee, by giving hints for supervisors on how they should attend to the training and safety of young entrants under their charge. Although made for the coal industry most of the ideas are generally applicable.
